mv_district_monthly_hours_cost.purpose: District-wide hours and cost per month

mv_district_service_code_monthly.purpose: District totals by service_code per month

mv_student_service_code_monthly.purpose: Student × service_code hours + cost per month

mv_provider_service_code_monthly.purpose: Clinician × service_code hours + cost per month

mv_student_service_intensity_monthly.purpose: Student service_days, hours, and avg_hours_per_day per month

mv_student_list.purpose: Unique list of all students found in invoice line items

mv_clinician_list.purpose: Unique list of all clinicians found in invoice line items

templates.increasing_trend: {entity} is trending upward with {metric} increasing from {oldest} to {newest}.
templates.decreasing_trend: {entity} is trending downward with {metric} falling from {oldest} to {newest}.

slots.entity_role: student | clinician | vendor | invoice | district | null
slots.time_window_kind: explicit_range | explicit_month | this_month | last_month | this_school_year | last_school_year | ytd | fall | winter | spring | summer | unspecified

entity_role.description: Primary domain entity the conversation is about.

entity_name.description: Resolved display name for the active entity (e.g., student or clinician full name).

metric.description: Primary metric the user cares about in this thread.

mode.description: Router mode describing the shape of the report/table.

plan_kind.description: Semantic analytics plan kind produced by the planner.

time_window_kind.description: Abstract time window classification used for follow-ups and fusion.

time_only_followup.description: User changes only the time window while keeping the same entity, metric, and general report shape.

provider_time_followup.description: User asks which providers/clinicians supported the same student for a specific time window.

metric_followup.description: User keeps the same entity and time, but switches metric (e.g., cost → hours, hours → caseload).

list_followup.description: User refers back to a previously shown list (students, clinicians, invoices) and wants to refine/filter it.

new_topic.description: Start a new topic; previous entity and time window should not be reused.

clarification_needed.description: User input is ambiguous or under-specified; agent should ask a concrete follow-up question instead of guessing.

examples.label: new_topic_different_student
examples.user_message: Show total cost for Jordan Lee last month.

examples.label: time_only_followup_ytd_vendor_cost
examples.user_message: Make it year to date instead.

examples.label: provider_time_followup_which_nurses_supported_her_september
examples.user_message: Which nurses supported her in September?

examples.label: provider_time_followup_who_provided_care_ytd
examples.user_message: Who provided care year to date?

examples.label: provider_time_followup_who_worked_with_her_last_month
examples.user_message: Who worked with her last month?

examples.label: provider_time_followup_who_supported_her_fall
examples.user_message: Who supported her during the fall?

examples.label: metric_followup_cost_from_hours_student
examples.user_message: Actually, show cost instead of hours.

examples.label: metric_followup_hours_for_district_trend
examples.user_message: Can you show hours instead of spend?

examples.label: metric_followup_hours_pronoun_followup
examples.user_message: How many hours did they have instead?

examples.label: list_followup_filter_that_student_list
examples.user_message: Filter that list to just students with last name Ramirez.

examples.label: list_followup_top_invoices_for_that_list
examples.user_message: Now from that list just show the top 10.

examples.label: list_followup_clinician_list_filter
examples.user_message: From that list, only show nurses.

examples.label: list_followup_refer_to_those_students
examples.user_message: For those students, continue the list but sorted alphabetically.

examples.label: new_topic_switch_to_different_student
examples.user_message: Now show total cost for Jack Wilson this school year.

examples.label: new_topic_switch_to_vendor_from_student
examples.user_message: Show monthly spend for the vendor BrightCare Nursing this year.

examples.label: new_topic_switch_to_clinician_caseload
examples.user_message: Show me the caseload for clinician Sofia Thomas this school year.

examples.label: new_topic_switch_to_student_list
examples.user_message: Show me a student list for this school year.

examples.label: new_topic_switch_to_clinician_student_breakdown
examples.user_message: Show which students clinician Sofia Thomas provided care for this school year.

examples.label: clarification_needed_pronoun_without_context
examples.user_message: How much did she cost this year?
